turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can i help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order four large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 4 large pizza is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni on the first one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bacon and olives on the second one, pepperoni, bacon and onion on the thirs one, and a meat lovers on the last one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you repeat your order please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a pepperoni pizza, a bacon and olive pizza, a pepperoni bacon and onion pizza, and a meat-lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second while i get your orders.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 4 large pizza, 1 pepperoni, 1 bacon with olive, 1 pepperoni with bacon and olive and 1 meat lover is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second while i get your total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so with 4 large pizza, 1 pepperoni, 1 bacon with olive, 1 pepperoni with bacon and olive and 1 meat lover your total comes to 100 dollars, shall we confirm the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
